mapper.insert: insert into FMS.FMS_PROVIDER (PROVIDER_ID, PROVIDER_CODE, PROVIDER_NAME, PROVIDER_SHORT_NAME, PROVIDER_TYPE, ADDRESS, CONTACT, ZIP_CODE, RECIEVE_UNIT, ACCOUNT_BANK, RECIEVE_ACCOUNT, TAX_REGIST_NO, REMARKS, ENABLED_FLAG, START_DATE, END_DATE, CREATED_BY, CREATION_DATE, LAST_UPDATED_BY, LAST_UPDATE_DATE, LAST_UPDATE_LOGIN, ATTRIBUTE1, ATTRIBUTE2, ATTRIBUTE3, ATTRIBUTE4, ATTRIBUTE5, ATTRIBUTE6, ATTRIBUTE7, ATTRIBUTE8, ATTRIBUTE9, ATTRIBUTE10) values (FMS_PROVIDER_S.nextval, #{providerCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{providerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{providerShortName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{providerType,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{contact,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{zipCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{recieveUnit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{accountBank,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{recieveAccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{taxRegistNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{enabledFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{startDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{endDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createdBy,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{creationDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{lastUpdatedBy,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{lastUpdateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{lastUpdateLogin,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{attribute1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{attribute2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{attribute3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{attribute4,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{attribute5,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{attribute6,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{attribute7,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{attribute8,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{attribute9,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{attribute10,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update FMS.FMS_PROVIDER set PROVIDER_CODE= #{providerCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PROVIDER_NAME = #{providerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PROVIDER_SHORT_NAME = #{providerShortName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PROVIDER_TYPE = #{providerType,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, ADDRESS = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CONTACT = #{contact,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ZIP_CODE = #{zipCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RECIEVE_UNIT = #{recieveUnit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ACCOUNT_BANK = #{accountBank,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RECIEVE_ACCOUNT = #{recieveAccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TAX_REGIST_NO = #{taxRegistNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REMARKS = #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ENABLED_FLAG = #{enabledFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, START_DATE = #{startDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, END_DATE = #{endDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, LAST_UPDATED_BY = #{lastUpdatedBy,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, LAST_UPDATE_DATE = #{lastUpdateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, LAST_UPDATE_LOGIN = #{lastUpdateLogin,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ATTRIBUTE1 = #{attribute1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ATTRIBUTE2 = #{attribute2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ATTRIBUTE3 = #{attribute3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ATTRIBUTE4 = #{attribute4,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ATTRIBUTE5 = #{attribute5,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ATTRIBUTE6 = #{attribute6,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ATTRIBUTE7 = #{attribute7,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ATTRIBUTE8 = #{attribute8,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ATTRIBUTE9 = #{attribute9,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ATTRIBUTE10 = #{attribute10,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where PROVIDER_ID = #{providerId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
mapper.select:
select t1.PROVIDER_ID, t1.PROVIDER_CODE, t1.PROVIDER_NAME, t1.PROVIDER_SHORT_NAME, t1.PROVIDER_TYPE, t1.ADDRESS, t1.CONTACT, t1.ZIP_CODE, t1.RECIEVE_UNIT, t1.ACCOUNT_BANK, t1.RECIEVE_ACCOUNT, t1.TAX_REGIST_NO, t1.REMARKS,ENABLED_FLAG, t1.START_DATE, t1.END_DATE, t1.CREATED_BY, t1.CREATION_DATE, t1.LAST_UPDATED_BY, t1.LAST_UPDATE_DATE, t1.LAST_UPDATE_LOGIN, t1.ATTRIBUTE1, t1.ATTRIBUTE2, t1.ATTRIBUTE3, t1.ATTRIBUTE4, t1.ATTRIBUTE5, t1.ATTRIBUTE6, t1.ATTRIBUTE7, t1.ATTRIBUTE8, t1.ATTRIBUTE9, t1.ATTRIBUTE10 from FMS.FMS_PROVIDER t1 where 1=1
AND t1.PROVIDER_NAME like '%${providerName}%'

select t1.PROVIDER_ID, t1.PROVIDER_CODE, t1.PROVIDER_NAME, t1.PROVIDER_SHORT_NAME, t1.PROVIDER_TYPE, t1.ADDRESS, t1.CONTACT, t1.ZIP_CODE, t1.RECIEVE_UNIT, t1.ACCOUNT_BANK, t1.RECIEVE_ACCOUNT, t1.TAX_REGIST_NO, t1.REMARKS,ENABLED_FLAG, t1.START_DATE, t1.END_DATE, t1.CREATED_BY, t1.CREATION_DATE, t1.LAST_UPDATED_BY, t1.LAST_UPDATE_DATE, t1.LAST_UPDATE_LOGIN, t1.ATTRIBUTE1, t1.ATTRIBUTE2, t1.ATTRIBUTE3, t1.ATTRIBUTE4, t1.ATTRIBUTE5, t1.ATTRIBUTE6, t1.ATTRIBUTE7, t1.ATTRIBUTE8, t1.ATTRIBUTE9, t1.ATTRIBUTE10 from FMS.FMS_PROVIDER t1 where 1=1
AND t1.PROVIDER_NAME = #{providerName}

select * from FMS_PROVIDER where 1=1 AND ENABLED_FLAG = 'Y'
and provider_id = #{providerId}
